ai-patthana18.18:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.18:0.3_0: Transmigration for the sake of defilements, etc., for the sake of prey.
ai-patthana18.18:1.1_0: And for the sake of defilement and also no cause or condition.
ai-patthana18.18:2.1_0: Or else there is no definitely because of this. ...
ai-patthana18.18:3.1_0: A single thing that gives rise to causes and conditions, and doesn’t give rise to the cause or reason for the sake of defilement. ...
ai-patthana18.18:3.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana18.18:4.1_0: And also for the sake of defilement and influence, or for the sake of defilement, nor for the sake of a cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.18:4.1_2: the five hindrances are not clear.
